definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: So Wedging was the mechanism for mountain building in the Qinling orogen.
sentences.chinese: 楔入構造活動是秦嶺造山帶的成山模型。

sentences.english: The middle and lower reaches of the Yangtze River are the foreland tectonic belt of the Dabieshan orogen .
sentences.chinese: 長江中下游地區，是大別造山帶的前陸構造帶。

sentences.english: Beihuaiyang basin and range structural belt is an important part of Dabie orogenic belt.
sentences.chinese: 北淮陽盆嶺構造帶是大別造山帶的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Disscusion of orogenic geochemical mapping in theory.
sentences.chinese: 造山帶地球化學編圖的理論探討。

sentences.english: The north area of Weihe River is located in the joint of the Qilian-North Qinling orogenic belt.
sentences.chinese: 天水渭北地區地處祁連與北秦嶺造山帶結合部位。

sentences.english: The region belongs to a complex intracontinental orogenic belt.
sentences.chinese: 構造複雜，是典型的陸內造山帶發育地區。

sentences.english: Finally, some hot topics and prospects for further research on continental orogens of China are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 最後指出中國大陸造山帶今後研究熱點和展望。

sentences.english: Is the tectonic setting of South Anhui metamorphic rocks an ancient land or an orogen?
sentences.chinese: 皖南變質岩分佈區是古陸還是一個造山帶？

sentences.english: The basin between orogenic belt and craton is called foreland basin.
sentences.chinese: 造山帶和克拉通之間的盆地稱之爲前陸盆地。

sentences.english: Detrital composition analysis of the Mesozoic sandstones indicates that their provenance is the Dabie orogen.
sentences.chinese: 中生界砂岩碎屑組分分析，表明其源區爲大別造山帶。

sentences.english: Weibei area is located in the joint of the Qilian and North Qinling orogenic belts.
sentences.chinese: 天水渭北地區地處祁連與北秦嶺造山帶結合部位。

sentences.english: The Imjingang and Ogcheon belts do not exhibit any metamorphic characteristics of collisional orogenic belts.
sentences.chinese: 臨津江帶和沃川帶都不具有碰撞造山帶的變質特徵。

sentences.english: The main parts of SW Yunnan orogenic zones consist of complicated metamorphic rock units.
sentences.chinese: 滇西南造山帶的主體由多期變質的岩石單元組成。

sentences.english: Jilin and Heilongjiang orogenic belt locate between the Huabei and Siberia plate.
sentences.chinese: 吉黑造山帶夾持於華北板塊和西伯利亞板塊之間。

sentences.english: The basement of EKOB formed in late Paleo-Proterozoic.
sentences.chinese: 東崑崙造山帶基底主要形成於古元古代晚期。

sentences.english: Eastern section of Bogda orogenic belt is near the East Junggar orogenic belt.
sentences.chinese: 新疆博格達造山帶東段，緊鄰東準噶爾造山帶。
